transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan ji.

Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan namaste haan bataye bataye.

Customer: Mam wo kya hai na wo ho gaya wo issue solve na.

Executive: Kya issue ho gaya?

Customer: Mam isme ek product listing ke regarding issue tha wo ho gaya solve wo.

Executive: Product kis cheez ka issue tha sir?

Customer: Ye product listing ka tha mam usme product listing ki.

Executive: Product listing thi.

Customer: Haan wo ho gaya issue unhone number de diye is number par wo photos dal do wo kar denge automatic ho jayega.

Executive: Achcha kis kaun sa number mila hai?

Customer: Ye 9696 aur bola unhone diya. Isme nahi dena hai sir photos mujhe bhejoge na aap Preeti naam hai mera.

Customer: Achcha achcha.

Customer: Ye wo to aap mujhe bhej rahe ho photo?

Executive: Nahi nahi usne wo to ho gaye usme update usme price dal raha hu main.

Executive: Haan to wo to maine update kar diye the na aap 9696 pe kya phone kiye hai sir aap.

Customer: Nahi nahi wo phone kar diye unhone mujhe.

Executive: Haan kya reason ki vajah se?

Customer: Nahi nahi maine nahi dekha nahi unhone phone kiye the maine utha diye usme.

Executive: Sir kuch bhi dikkat hua kare na to mera number hai aapke pass aapne to mujhe group me bhi add kar diya hai jo last time jinke sath aap group tha. 

Customer: Ji ji theek hai theek hai.

Executive: To aap usme photos share karo ab.

Customer: Wo kar diye usme ho gaya na update main kar raha hu unka price dal raha hu. 

Executive: Haan aap mujhe haan wo maine photos update bhi kar diye hain aapke aapne check kiye. 

Customer: Haan wo main check kar raha hu bas usme price dal raha hu aur uske. Achcha to abhi koi concern hai dusra?

Customer: Nahi koi nahi koi nahi.

Executive: Koi concern nahi hai to main aapka ye concern close kar du?

Customer: Okay okay.

Executive: To mail pe aapke pass satisfied mark karne ko aayega sir to aap bhi satisfied mark kar dijiyega.

Customer: Achcha theek hai. Info values me aayega unke theek hai.

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Theek hai mam karta hu. Mail pe aayega sir theek hai koi bhi aapko phone photos aapko share karni ho mere hi whatsapp pe kariye.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Theek hai main hi dekhungi and to mujhe group me bhi add kiya hua hai.

Customer: Haan ab usme aa jayega link vagera unke usme dusre me. Haan aap jo bhi group me jo bhi bhejna ho aap us group me bhej diya karo fir mujhe. 

Executive: Theek hai okay okay. Usme aapne mujhe add kiya hai na kal kya kal add kiya tha aapne.

Customer: Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: Haan na to abhi koi concern to nahi hai close kar du concern? Nahi nahi abhi kuch nahi bas main ye okay kar raha hu theek hai okay.

Executive: Theek hai to fir main feedback ke liye aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega abhi main close karti hu to aap ek bari aapko call karti hu fir. Theek hai ya message karti hu mere feedback ke liye aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai Kesri ji okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had an issue with product listing.



Resolution:

- Issue with product listing was resolved.

- Executive updated the customer's photos.

- Executive asked to share photos in WhatsApp group.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark satisfied on the feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product listing, photos, whatsapp group, feedback
